Description: Ostracon, fragment of shoulder of a red-brown pottery grooved vessel, the interior is partially covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and one red-painted Greek letter - phi.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394084) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394084)
